name: thinkpad-thermal
description: Display ThinkPad thermal and fan status using /proc/acpi/ibm/thermal and /proc/acpi/ibm/fan.
author: Faris Mujakic <faris.mujakic@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn run types:lock && yarn run types:build && yarn run build:ts
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:ts && yarn run types:build
scripts.types:lock: rm -rf docs-lock.json && cross-env XDG_DATA_DIRS=$XDG_DATA_DIRS:/usr/share/gir-1.0:/usr/share/gnome-shell:/usr/lib/mutter-10:/usr/lib64/mutter-10 yarn run gi-ts config --lock
scripts.watch: yarn run build && yarn run rollup -c --watch
